SoftwareType.Name: Database
SoftwareType.Description: Storage of large amounts of data with indexing and fast retrieval.

Feature.Name: Data engine
Feature.Description: Basic data storage and retrieval engine.

Feature.Name: Indexing
Feature.Description: Allow indexes for much faster data retrieval.

Feature.Name: Remote connections
Feature.Description: Connect from anywhere, allowing applications to be on different servers than their data.

Feature.Name: Secure connections
Feature.Description: Make remote connections securely, by encrypting traffic.

Feature.Name: Master/slave
Feature.Description: Connect more than one database together to make a cluster.

Feature.Name: Cloud support
Feature.Description: Databases can be stored off-premises on the cloud.

Feature.Name: Table-level locking
Feature.Description: Entire tables can be locked, to prevent overwriting data while other data are being written.

Feature.Name: Row-level locking
Feature.Description: Table rows can be individually locked, to allow other rows to process data at the same time.

Feature.Name: Client GUI
Feature.Description: Provide a GUI tool to allow data to be manipulated.

Feature.Name: Shards
Feature.Description: Databases are configured into shards allowing the best server to respond first.

Feature.Name: 64-bit
Feature.Description: 64-bit allows the storage of much higher integers, and much more precise floating point numbers.

Feature.Name: Machine learning
Feature.Description: The database learns from existing data to predict results.

Feature.Name: Personnel directory
Feature.Description: The database can be used to store access credentials and employee sign in details.
